data.lyric:
[ti:Nothing Breaks Like a Heart]
[ar:Mark Ronson/Miley Cyrus]
[al:Nothing Breaks Like a Heart]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Nothing Breaks Like a Heart - Mark Ronson/Miley Cyrus (麦莉·赛勒斯)
[00:02.88]Lyrics by：Mark Ronson/Thomas Brenneck/Miley Cyrus/Conor Szymanski/Ilsey Juber/Maxime Picard/Clément Picard
[00:05.76]Composed by：Mark Ronson/Thomas Brenneck/Miley Cyrus/Conor Szymanski/Ilsey Juber/Maxime Picard/Clément Picard
[00:08.64]This world can hurt you
[00:10.74]It cuts you deep and leaves a scar
[00:14.10]Things fall apart but nothing breaks like a heart
[00:19.84]And nothing breaks like a heart
[00:25.57]I heard you on the phone last night
[00:27.51]We live and die by pretty lies
[00:29.62]You know it oh we both know it
[00:33.82]These silver bullet cigarettes
[00:35.91]This burning house there's nothing left
[00:37.90]It's smoking we both know it
[00:42.32]We got all night to fall in love
[00:44.36]But just like that we fall apart
[00:46.33]We're broken we're broken
[00:50.21]Mmm well nothing nothing nothing gon' save us now
[00:54.80]Well there's broken silence
[00:56.88]By thunder crashing in the dark
[01:00.41]Crash in the dark
[01:03.21]And this broken record
[01:05.28]Spin endless circles in the bar
[01:08.55]Spin 'round in the bar
[01:11.81]This world can hurt you
[01:13.72]It cuts you deep and leaves a scar
[01:17.16]Things fall apart but nothing breaks like a heart
[01:21.52]Mhmm and nothing breaks like a heart
[01:28.63]We'll leave each other cold as ice
[01:30.57]And high and dry the desert wind
[01:32.60]Is blowin' is blowin'
[01:37.17]Remember what you said to me
[01:39.05]We were drunk in love in Tennessee
[01:41.20]And I hold it we both know it
[01:44.97]Mmm nothing nothing nothing gon' save us now
[01:49.75]Nothing nothing nothing gon' save us now
[01:53.78]Well there's broken silence
[01:55.88]By thunder crashing in the dark
[01:59.37]Crash in the dark
[02:02.18]And this broken record
[02:04.27]Spin endless circles in the bar
[02:07.50]Spin 'round in the bar
[02:10.72]This world can hurt you
[02:12.74]It cuts you deep and leaves a scar
[02:16.17]Things fall apart but nothing breaks like a heart
[02:20.44]Mhmm and nothing breaks like a heart
[02:26.16]Nothing breaks like a heart
[02:28.92]Mhmm and nothing breaks like a heart
[02:32.97]My heart my heart
[02:40.26]Nothing nothing nothing gon' save us now
[02:44.55]Nothing nothing nothing gon' save us now
[02:48.29]Well there's broken silence
[02:50.59]By thunder crashing in the dark
[02:54.27]Crash in the dark
[02:56.81]And this broken record
[02:58.94]Spin endless circles in the bar
[03:02.26]Spin 'round in the bar
[03:05.35]This world can hurt you
[03:07.48]It cuts you deep and leaves a scar
[03:10.90]Things fall apart but nothing breaks like a heart
[03:15.12]Mhmm but nothing breaks like a heart
[03:20.84]But nothing breaks like a heart
[03:23.64]Mhmm but nothing breaks like a heart
data.trans:
[ti:怎比得上让人绝望的心碎]
[ar:Mark Ronson/Miley Cyrus]
[al:怎比得上让人绝望的心碎]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.88]//
[00:05.76]//
[00:08.64]这世界会让你遍体鳞伤
[00:10.74]它会让你心如刀割 伤痕累累
[00:14.10]尽管满目疮痍但怎比得上让人绝望的心碎
[00:19.84]没什么能媲美心碎的杀伤力
[00:25.57]昨夜听到你在电话那头的哽咽声
[00:27.51]我们在编织的美好谎言里活着也在谎言中死去
[00:29.62]你明白的 噢其实我们都清楚
[00:33.82]这些荷枪实弹点燃了
[00:35.91]整间屋子的火热氛围 瞬间引爆全场
[00:37.90]刹那间烟消云散 我们都明白
[00:42.32]整晚我们徜徉于爱河
[00:44.36]但即便如此我们依然不可避免的分道扬镳
[00:46.33]心支离破碎 我们肝肠寸断
[00:50.21]好吧 没有什么能拯救你我
[00:54.80]那黑夜中的一声惊雷 
[00:56.88]划破了这绝望的死寂
[01:00.41]划破这无边的黑暗
[01:03.21]那张残破不堪的旧唱片
[01:05.28]依然在酒吧的角落旋转不休
[01:08.55]在酒吧的角落旋转不休
[01:11.81]这世界会让你遍体鳞伤
[01:13.72]它会让你心如刀割 伤痕累累
[01:17.16]尽管满目疮痍但怎比得上让人绝望的心碎
[01:21.52]没什么能媲美心碎的杀伤力
[01:28.63]我们任彼此心若寒霜
[01:30.57]陷入孤立无援的绝境
[01:32.60]任凭那凛冽的沙漠之风呼啸着
[01:37.17]你对我许下的誓言犹在耳畔
[01:39.05]田纳西州见证了我们的爱情
[01:41.20]我想我们都清楚的知道
[01:44.97]没有什么能拯救你我
[01:49.75]没有什么能拯救你我
